summary: FoundersSection keeps the same Kuldeep image path and improves circular avatar rendering via object-cover/object-center, but the diff summary does not show any static asset (image file) being added/modified to actually replace the old Kuldeep photo, nor evidence that the old photo is no longer used anywhere else.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the existing Founder (Kuldeep) photo used on the website with the user-uploaded real photo, and ensure the old Kuldeep photo is no longer used anywhere in the UI (served as a static frontend asset, valid path, good circular avatar rendering).
missing_requirements.reason: The code still references the same Kuldeep image path (/assets/generated/founder-kuldeep.dim_512x512.jpg) and the diff summary does not include any added/modified static asset image file indicating the uploaded real photo was actually placed into the frontend assets or that any previous image was removed/fully dereferenced across the UI.
